If you're not aware

places in the world. Europe has a bit

They also have a data protection

Commission. But in general, we're left

Things are getting
used inappropriately. And as a web developer,

the extent that you can,

and to use tools and
provide interfaces that don't put those
components at risk.
So identity theft concerns.

to ensure that we protect

the identity of all

to get more and more

personal individual reputation. Forget about your organization. But that puts your
organization at risk.

content with dark data. So you may have
all kinds of data

that you're sharing through your
applications, and some of that is an identity and a PII risk.

an Excel spreadsheet, and someone said, well, we

a true understanding of how to protect data from misuse,
that insecure content.

Various security holes--
cross-site scripting and web beacons, various

social collaboration,

accessibility concerns.

There are some links here
